text: Nicole Billa (born on 5 March 1996 in Kufstein, Austria) is an Austrian football player who currently plays for TSG 1899 Hoffenheim and the Austria women's national team. In the 2020–21 Frauen Bundesliga, she was the top scorer with 23 goals. == Statistics == === International === Senior national team recordWeltfussball (German) National team Year Apps Goals Austria
